contract_title: Code Quality & Standards Cleanup & Testing Enhancement

contract_details.description: Systematically clean and enhance code quality systems while preserving functionality. Focus on improving testing infrastructure, eliminating code smells, and ensuring consistent standards.
contract_details.background: Agent-8 has expertise in code quality and standards. This contract leverages that expertise to clean up quality systems while maintaining high standards and increasing test coverage.
objectives: Audit all code quality violations and standards issues
Refactor code to improve quality metrics without breaking functionality
Increase test coverage across all modules to >85%
Eliminate code smells and technical debt in quality-critical systems
Enhance automated quality checking and reporting systems
Validate quality improvements don't introduce regressions
deliverables: Comprehensive code quality audit report with cleanup recommendations
Refactored code with improved quality metrics (>90% score)
Test coverage increased to >85% across all modules
Code smell elimination report with specific improvements
Quality validation report confirming no regressions
technical_requirements: Code quality analysis and refactoring tools
Test coverage measurement and improvement tools
Code smell detection and elimination software
success_criteria: Code quality score >90% across all modules

contract_history.details: Created cleanup-focused contract for Agent-8 code quality and testing enhancement
